body:
Hello everyone!

Today, I would like to discuss with you all about Pocket Edition.
As most of you know, Pocket Edition has released the "Multiplayer" button. 

I thought "could I play on Avicus using Pocket Edition?"
I attempted to do so, until I came across with this problem.
It asked for "Server's Name","Server's IP address", and "Port."

I am familiar with the first two slots, but not with the port.
Therefore, I would like to ask you all two questions:

1. Is Avicus compatible with Pocket Edition?
2. If so, what is the port number? Or hoe can I find the port number?

I would really appreciate if someone can answer these questions.
Thank you so much for reading this.
I will see you guys in game.
Bye!
body_tagged:
Hello everyone!

Today, I would like to discuss with you all about Pocket Edition.
As most of you know, Pocket Edition has released the "Multiplayer" button. 

I thought "could I play on Avicus using Pocket Edition?"
I attempted to do so, until I came across with this problem.
It asked for "Server's Name","Server's IP address", and "Port."

I am familiar with the first two slots, but not with the port.
Therefore, I would like to ask you all two questions:

1. Is Avicus compatible with Pocket Edition?
2. If so, what is the port number? Or hoe can I find the port number?

I would really appreciate if someone can answer these questions.
Thank you so much for reading this.
I will see you guys in game.
Bye!
title: Avicus in Pocket Edition

replies.body:
Avicus probably isn't with pocket edition.
And pls no. There are 6-10 year olds using pocket edition too. 
I'm sure their parents don't want to hear "KYS YOU NIGGER FAGGOT" in chat lmao

They aren't as mature as you, Ateh... :/

replies.body: Yeah they are two completely versions of Minecraft. Although you can play PE with the Windows 10 version of Minecraft, there really isn't any gain for Avicus if it adds a server there.

replies.body:
We don't support MCPE currently, but that is not to say we never will.

It's pretty neat, but definitely would need more work. Fun to try things out :D

replies.body:
They're still working on it. Hopefully it'll get fixed soon though!

@OP: I don't think Pocket Edition would be that good as it'd be hard to PvP players using computers, unless the Pocket Edition players only fought against other Pocket Edition players [if you know what I mean].
